summary.span: 由代码生成命令行工具和 Visual Studio 中的工具使用，生成用于与数据服务通信的强类型客户端对象。

span.span: Used by the code generation command line tools and tools in Visual Studio to generate strongly-typed client side objects for communicating with data services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类不打算用于公共用途。This class is not intended for public use. © 2009 Microsoft Corporation.© 2009 Microsoft Corporation. 保留所有权利。All rights reserved.
